description: She was released on $3,500 bond and faces a date in General Sessions Court on June 15. He was being held on $15,000 bond and faced a date in General Sessions Court on May 29. He was being held on $30,000 bond and faced a date in General Sessions Court on May 29.
text:
Sam Scott Shaw, 59, of 147 Unicoi Lake Road, Tellico Plains, was arrested on
May 26 by the McMinn County Sheriff's Department and charged with violation of
state probation. He was being held without bond and faces a date in Criminal
Court on June 8.

Kimbally Berger Maillet, 51, of 598 Sweet Creek Road, Eidson, was arrested on
May 28 by the Tennessee Highway Patrol and charged with driving under the
influence, possession of a handgun while intoxicated and violation of the open
container law. She was released on $3,500 bond and faces a date in General
Sessions Court on June 15.

Matthew Ryan Lincoln, 26, with no address listed, was arrested on May 28 by
the Athens Police Department and charged with aggravated burglary. He was
being held on $15,000 bond and faced a date in General Sessions Court on May
29.

Kaleb Dakota Hall, 25, of 220 Big Oak Dr., Madisonville, was arrested on May
29 by the McMinn County Sheriff's Department and charged with possession of a
schedule I drug for resale and possession of a Schedule II drug for resale. He
was being held on $30,000 bond and faced a date in General Sessions Court on
May 29.

Jones Williams, 49, of 538 County Road 804, Etowah, was arrested on May 29 by
the McMinn County Sheriff's Department and charged with possession of a
Schedule I drug for resale and possession of a Schedule II drug for resale. He
was being held on $30,000 bond and faced a date in General Sessions Court on
May 29.

Tiffany Dawn Lovingood, 34, of 749 County Road 255, Athens, was arrested on
May 29 by the Athens Police Department and charged with failure to appear. She
was released on $750 bond to Blount County authorities.

Bryan Teasley, 54, with no address listed, was arrested on May 29 by the
Athens Police Department and charged with public intoxication. He was released
on $1,500 bond and faces a date in General Sessions Court on June 15.

Gregory Nichols, 28, of 112 County Road 709, Athens, was arrested on May 30 by
the Athens Police Department and charged with vandalism and a warrant for
aggravated burglary. He was released on $11,000 bond and faces dates in
General Sessions Court on June 1 and June 15.

Maureen Delpozo, 43, of 125 Spence St., Athens, was arrested on May 30 by the
Athens Police Department and charged with domestic violence. She was released
on $500 bond and faces dates in General Sessions Court on June 1 and June 15.

Erin L. Sides, 36, of 188 Bob Banks Drive, Jasper, Alabama, was arrested on
May 30 by the Athens Police Department and charged with burglary. She was
being held on $30,000 bond and faces a date in General Sessions Court on June
1.

Marcus D. Brasher, 43, of 144 Coy Drive, Chelsea, Alabama, was arrested on May
30 by the Athens Police Department and charged with a warrant for burglary. He
was being held on $30,000 bond and faces a date in General Sessions Court on
June 1.

David Edwin Burnette, 40, of 461 McCroskey St., Englewood, was arrested on May
30 by the McMinn County Sheriff's Department and charged with public
intoxication. He was released on $500 bond and faces a date in General
Sessions Court on June 15.
